directions: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil.  Add potatoes and cook until tender but still firm, about 15 minutes. Drain, and cool. Transfer to a large bowl.
Meanwhile, mix vinegar, garlic, salt, and pepper in a mixing bowl.  Drizzle in olive oil,  whisking until mixture thickens.
Toss potatoes with vinegar and oil mixture and arugula. Serve at room temperature.
ingredients: 1 bunch arugula - rinsed, dried and torn
title: Potato Arugula Salad
